page.title: 05SCHOOL LIFE IN KINGSCLERE
page.content: At Kingsclere Primary School there are several out-of-school activities. You may study French conversation, join gym club or art club. There is a chess club and a table-tennis club. Most children take their cycling proficiency test. You may also learn to play recorders or guitars, the piano or the cello. In your second term at school you have a medical examinationand every year a dental check and a visit to the dentist if it is necessary. The school has many social activities for children and adults. In autumn we have the Autumn Fair to help raise money for the school, a Christmas concert and parties. In spring we have a Valentine disco and a Barn Dance, and in summer there are May Day celebrations and a fete. On one evening parents may visit teachers.
